subdisciplines.name: African Architecture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the architectural styles, building materials, and construction methods used in traditional and contemporary African architecture and design.

subdisciplines.name: African Sculpture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the traditional and contemporary sculptural practices throughout Africa. It includes the study of materials, techniques, forms, styles, and iconography.

subdisciplines.name: African Ceramics
subdisciplines.description: The study of traditional and contemporary African pottery, including materials, techniques, forms, styles, and iconography.

subdisciplines.name: African Textiles and Fashion
subdisciplines.description: The study of traditional and contemporary African textile production, including weaving, dying, embroidery, and fashion.
